product_name: Zamberlan 310 Skill GT Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: The 310 Skill GT hiking boots combine waterproof protection and the classic fit of Zamberlan for use on tough day hikes and moderate backpacking. Durable 1-piece Hydrobloc(R) full-grain leather uppers offer excellent flexibility and support. Zamberlan Foot Wrapping System incorporates nonbulky tongues and padded cuffs and heels to secure feet and add comfort. Padded and gusseted tongues relieve lace pressure across insteps while also keeping out trail debris. Seam-sealed Gore-Tex(R) liners protect feet from wet weather and allow excess moisture vapor to escape, keeping feet dry and comfortable. Nylon linings wick moisture away from your feet, further ensuring dry comfort. Removable, moisture-wicking insoles are anatomically shaped for extra comfort and are perforated for ventilation and moisture control. Polyurethane midsoles provide all-day cushioning while thermoplastic urethane midsole shanks enhance rigidity and stability on uneven terrain. Exclusive Vibram(R) rubber outsoles deliver durability and reliable traction on rough ground.
short_description: The 310 Skill GT hiking boots combine waterproof protection and the classic fit of Zamberlan for use on tough day hikes and moderate backpacking.
